translations: 饮酒；奠酒祭神仪式（形容词 libationary）

sentences.sentence: I will not pour out their libations of blood or take up their names on my lips.
sentences.translation: 他们所浇奠的血我不献上，我嘴唇也不题别神的名号。

sentences.sentence: I will not pour out their libations of blood or take up their names on my lips.
sentences.translation: 他们所浇奠的血我不献上；我嘴唇不提别神的名号。

sentences.sentence: Vanderbilt Court features large sofas, delicious libations, and an ocean-front terrace.
sentences.translation: 范德比尔特法院功能的大型沙发，美味的酒，和一个海景露台。
